

= Introduction =

Functional image dosimetry...
Note: VRAK was written for dosimetry for long-half-life, therapeutic isotopes where images in a span of days after treatment. It has not been tested for the short time span pharmacokinetics of diagnostic radionuclides (F-18, Ga-68).

= Details =

Instructions for installing and running VRAK (along with Elastix for registration are contained here). Click through the table of contents on the left for more information... 


mhd_utils (functions for importing and writing mhd/raw files) is adapted from Bing Jian's module in [http://code.google.com/p/diffusion-mri/ diffusion-mri]
